auth-errors.Configuration: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please contact our support
auth-errors.AccessDenied: You don't have permission for this action
auth-errors.Verification: Access token has expired or has already been used
auth-errors.Default: An unforeseen authentication error has occured. Please contact our support

signin-errors.OAuthSignin: Error in constructing an authorization URL
signin-errors.OAuthCallback: Error in handling the response from an OAuth provider
signin-errors.OAuthCreateAccount: Could not create OAuth provider user in the database.
signin-errors.EmailCreateAccount: Could not create email provider user in the database.
signin-errors.Callback: Error in the OAuth callback handler route
signin-errors.OAuthAccountNotLinked: Email on the account is already linked, but not with this OAuth account
signin-errors.EmailSignin: Sending the e-mail with the verification token failed
signin-errors.SessionRequired: The content of this page requires you to be signed in at all times
signin-errors.Default: An unforeseen authorization error has occured. Please contact our support
